 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָרַק‎</span> **verb** ==gnash or grind the teeth==, only in poetry (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhJAAaAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAkABoAAAJYjI+py20AgZKLuhdtyClr93lddF1QiabqyrYuSn1vRc42Jt+Hl4NnY+FMZMLNb1R80I7GGK+2G0KbTyaiZ7WWtNEd15QL9cBP5Kt8/aqmVN1yfFO753RFAQA7"> ***file, rub together, grate*** or ***grind*** (teeth); Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id***.) — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> [[Job.16.9|Job 16:9]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַחֲרֹק‎</span> [[Ps.112.10|Ps 112:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּחַרְקוּֿ‎</span> [[Lam.2.16|Lam 2:16]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָרֹק‎</span> [[Ps.35.16|Ps 35:16]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹרֵק‎</span> [[Ps.37.12|Ps 37:12]] — ***grind*** the teeth in rage against: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁניו על‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> [[Ps.37.12|Ps 37:12]]; [[Ps.35.16|Ps 35:16]] absolute without <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span> [[Ps.112.10|Ps 112:10]]; [[Lam.2.16|Lam 2:16]] (only here with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁן‎</span> singular); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> instrumental ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:119»§ 119</sup>, 3 b, R. [[BDB#Da|Da]]<sup>Synt, § 73 R. 6</sup>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בשׁניו עלֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> [[Job.16.9|Job 16:9]].
